definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The team seems unstoppable in their drive for the championship.
sentences.chinese: 這支球隊爭取冠軍的氣勢似銳不可當。

sentences.english: Early in 2009, the dollar appeared unstoppable.
sentences.chinese: 美元在2009年初期銳不可當。

sentences.english: That formidable remnant had been annihilated; the Guard was dead.
sentences.chinese: 那點銳不可當的殘餘也被殲滅了，羽林軍覆沒了。

sentences.english: The army in front of me looks invincible.
sentences.chinese: 我眼前的這支軍隊銳不可當。

sentences.english: His own career continues its inexorable ascent.
sentences.chinese: 他事業的上升勢頭銳不可當。

sentences.english: He's a lean, mean, fighting machine.
sentences.chinese: 他是一架銳不可當的戰鬥機器。

sentences.english: And on his return in the last few games, he was already looking very sharp.
sentences.chinese: 而且從他最後迴歸的幾場比賽來看，他銳不可當。

sentences.english: This team is unstoppable – they won the championship with one bash at it.
sentences.chinese: 這個球隊銳不可當，一舉拿下冠軍。
